Package org.lwjgl.bgfx

Class BGFXCaps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bgfx.BGFXCaps
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.lwjgl.system.Pointer

    public class BGFXCaps
extends org.lwjgl.system.Struct
    Renderer capabilities.

    Member documentation

    • rendererType – renderer backend type. One of:
      RENDERER_TYPE_DIRECT3D11RENDERER_TYPE_DIRECT3D12RENDERER_TYPE_DIRECT3D9
      RENDERER_TYPE_GNMRENDERER_TYPE_METALRENDERER_TYPE_NOOP
      RENDERER_TYPE_OPENGLRENDERER_TYPE_OPENGLESRENDERER_TYPE_VULKAN
    • supported – supported functionality. One or more of:
      CAPS_ALPHA_TO_COVERAGECAPS_BLEND_INDEPENDENTCAPS_COMPUTECAPS_CONSERVATIVE_RASTER
      CAPS_DRAW_INDIRECTCAPS_FRAGMENT_DEPTHCAPS_FRAGMENT_ORDERINGCAPS_GRAPHICS_DEBUGGER
      CAPS_HIDPICAPS_HMDCAPS_INDEX32CAPS_INSTANCING
      CAPS_OCCLUSION_QUERYCAPS_RENDERER_MULTITHREADEDCAPS_SWAP_CHAINCAPS_TEXTURE_2D_ARRAY
      CAPS_TEXTURE_3DCAPS_TEXTURE_BLITCAPS_TEXTURE_COMPARE_ALLCAPS_TEXTURE_COMPARE_LEQUAL
      CAPS_TEXTURE_CUBE_ARRAYCAPS_TEXTURE_READ_BACKCAPS_VERTEX_ATTRIB_HALFCAPS_VERTEX_ATTRIB_UINT10
    • vendorId – selected GPU vendor PCI id. One of:
      PCI_ID_AMDPCI_ID_INTELPCI_ID_NONEPCI_ID_NVIDIAPCI_ID_SOFTWARE_RASTERIZER
    • deviceId – selected GPU device id
    • homogeneousDepth – true when NDC depth is in [-1, 1] range
    • originBottomLeft – true when NDC origin is at bottom left
    • numGPUs – number of enumerated GPUs
    • gpu – enumerated GPUs
    • limits – rendering limits
    • formats – supported texture formats

    Layout

    struct bgfx_caps_t {
    bgfx_renderer_type_t rendererType;
    uint64_t supported;
    uint16_t vendorId;
    uint16_t deviceId;
    bool homogeneousDepth;
    bool originBottomLeft;
    uint8_t numGPUs;
    bgfx_caps_gpu_t gpu[4];
    bgfx_caps_limits_t limits;
    uint16_t formats[BGFX_TEXTURE_FORMAT_COUNT];
}

    • Constructor Detail

      • BGFXCaps

        public BGFXCaps(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a BGFXCaps instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
